comment.content: 김태희씨..좋은 정보 감사드립니다. 앞으로 모임에서도 자주뵙죠? ^^

post.content:
1367214 - Discover a fulfilling IT Career with... (Reference : 4062198)

Discover a fulfilling IT Career with Alberta Blue Cross INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CAREER FAIR Tuesday, March 2, 2010, 9am-3pm,

Inter Continental Toronto Centre, Lower Level Ballroom A, 225 Front Street West, Toronto, ON.

Our growing Information Technology department is looking for strong professionals who value a work-life balance, appreciate flexible hours and can succeed in an environment where innovative and creative thinking is not only welcomed but also encouraged. Attend our information technology career fair to learn more about available career opportunities and how you can become part of our award-winning organization. For available career opportunities, visit : www.ab.bluecross.ca
post.title: small Job Fair Mar.2, 2010
